meanings.sent1: Ringing the bell will ignify the start of the race.
meanings.sent3: The barking dog ignified the arrival of the mailman.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun ignifies the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors ignify joy and celebration.

meanings.sent1: His actions ignify his true intentions.
meanings.sent2: The painting ignifies the artist's emotions.
meanings.sent3: The loud music ignified their excitement for the party.
meanings.sent4: The blooming flowers ignify the arrival of spring.

meanings.definition: To convey a meaning or message
meanings.sent1: The tone of her voice ignifies her frustration.
meanings.sent2: The flag ignifies unity and patriotism.
meanings.sent3: The cryptic note ignified a mysterious treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The ancient ruins ignify a rich history.
meanings.sent5: The traffic light ignifies when to stop and go.
